metadata.name: X2E-Villains #1
metadata.description:
X2E-VILLAINS（X2EV）はX2E-DAOが送る思想を全面的に投入して作り上げるジェネラティブNFTコレクション！  
  
真の敵は自分自身…自分を救えるのは自分だけ、あなたが思う敵は本当に敵ですか？  
  
自分が変われば、きっと世界は変えられる  
真の敵は自分…さぁ、戦おう！  
  
X2E-VILLAINS (X2EV) is a generative NFT collection created with the shared beliefs of X2E-DAO!  
  
The true enemy is yourself...Only you can save yourself. Is the enemy you think is truly the real enemy?  
  
If you can change yourself, it may even be possible to change the world.  
The true enemy is yourself…now, let’s fight!
